title: Tell Us About Your Worst Behaviour
text:
Photo: Shutterstock

There’s a famous subreddit where people tell you whether you’re being an arsehole. But sometimes you already know you’re the arsehole, and you don’t know how to stop.

Even nice people have bad behaviours that we can’t quite shake. What’s yours? Are you constantly late? too critical of your friends? a complainer? Do you have trouble keeping a secret or keeping your temper? Do you make annoying comments on productivity blogs?

What’s the worst behaviour that you wish you could quit, but that proved too hard to shake? What solution have you tried and failed?

Leave a comment below. Don’t be afraid. Open up. It’ll make you feel better. It’ll make you feel like less of an arsehole.
